import React, {Component} from 'react'; class Calci extends Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state = { temp : 0, firstOprand : 0, secondOprand : 0, Operator : '' } } render(){ return(

{this.state.firstOprand}

{this.state.Operator}

{this.state.secondOprand}

{this.state.temp}

) } } export default Calci
